# SY21-22 Mid-Year Reports

<br>

<center> Passwords for Reports are <a href="https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1eAUdWEzc0R7WzpztOvutRp2FYDtpks37LSFV8sq8ezg/edit?usp=sharing" target="_blank">here</a> which will only be viewable if you are a Teaching Lab employee. Different tabs within the spreadsheet contain the passwords for each year. </center>

<br>

```{r echo = F, layout = "l-page"}
library(bs4cards)
report_galleries <- tibble::tibble(
  location = c(
    "All Partners",
    "DE_DE Department of Education",
    "NY_Amistad Dual Language",
    "NY_Rochester City Schools",
    "TN_McNairy County Schools",
    "WI_WI DPI"
  ),
  long_name = c(
    "All Partners Report",
    "DE_DE Department of Education Report",
    "NY_Amistad Dual Language Report",
    "NY_Rochester City Schools Report",
    "TN_McNairy County Schools Report",
    "WI_WI DPI Report"
  ),
  image_url = c(
    here::here("Images/Reports/2022-2023/MidYear/final_report_all_sites.png"),
    here::here("Images/Reports/2022-2023/MidYear/final_report_de_de_department_of_education.png"),
    here::here("Images/Reports/2022-2023/MidYear/final_report_ny_amistad_dual_language.png"),
    here::here("Images/Reports/2022-2023/MidYear/final_report_ny_rochester_city_schools.png"),
    here::here("Images/Reports/2022-2023/MidYear/final_report_tn_mcnairy_county_schools.png"),
    here::here("Images/Reports/2022-2023/MidYear/final_report_wi_wi_dpi.png")
  ),
  link = c("Reports/2023Reports/MidYear/final_report_all_sites.html",
  "Reports/2023Reports/MidYear/final_report_de_de_department_of_education.html",
  "Reports/2023Reports/MidYear/final_report_ny_amistad_dual_language.html",
  "Reports/2023Reports/MidYear/final_report_ny_rochester_city_schools.html",
  "Reports/2023Reports/MidYear/final_report_tn_mcnairy_county_schools.html",
  "Reports/2023Reports/MidYear/final_report_wi_wi_dpi.html")
)

report_galleries %>%
  cards(
    title = "Mid-Year\nReport",
    footer = long_name,
    link = link,
    image = image_url,
    width = 2,
    layout = "label-right",
    spacing = 3
  )
```
